DOC.TEXT: Guido deWindt , the Belgian team ' s press officer , estimated that Saturday ' s game against the_Netherlands will draw a television audience of more_than 300 million in Europe.It will be shown in prime_time for much of the Continent , beginning at 6:30 p.m. in Belgium .
